main.name: Ankita Marathe
main.description: at University of North Carolina at Charlotte
main.bio: I am a Graduate student majoring in Computer Science at University of North Carolina at Charlotte. My focus of study is Software Engineering, and I am looking for Summer Internship 2022 opportunities in Software Development / Software Engineer / Full Stack Developer graduating 2023. My objective is to obtain an opportunity to learn, absorb and refine my skills to achieve constant growth as a person and a professional in the field of Computer Science. I would also like to work with a dynamic firm and overcome all the challenges in the project on time. I have done multiple projects and taken courses in Masters degree towards the area of my interest.
main.contactmessage: Actively looking for a Summer Internship 2022. And if you want to discuss technical stuff or develop a software product, feel free to contact me.

Worked on Transaction reviews for the transactions that occurred on the toll. Developed frontend screens for Automatic Traffic Management System (ATMS) in React JS.Created database CRUD operation modules, event auditing module, landing page showing overall status of events using Nivo Charts.
